name: Slider

props.name: value
props.description: Controlled value.

props.name: defaultValue
props.description: Default for uncontrolled usage.

props.name: onChange
props.description: Fires on every change (pointer + keyboard).

props.name: min
props.description: Minimum allowed value.

props.name: max
props.description: Maximum allowed value.

props.name: step
props.description: Fixed increment when `snap="step"`; defaults to 1.

props.name: presets
props.description: Preset snap points when `snap="presets"`.

props.name: snap
props.description: Snap behaviour.

props.name: precision
props.description: Number of decimal places allowed. Default 0 (integers only).

props.name: showValue
props.description: Show live numeric value above thumb.

props.name: showMinMax
props.description: Show min/max labels beneath the track ends.

props.name: showTicks
props.description: Show tick marks (follows snap points or `ticks`).

props.name: ticks
props.description: Custom tick set (overrides derived ticks).

props.name: name
props.description:
Field identifier used for FormControl binding and forwarded to the underlying control
when applicable. Components can require `name` locally if they depend on it.

props.name: label
props.description: Visual label rendered by the component or its wrapper. Accepts string or node.

props.name: helperText
props.description: Supplemental hint or validation content typically rendered under the control.

props.name: error
props.description: Marks the field invalid; components may adjust visuals and helper text color.

props.name: fullWidth
props.description: Stretches the field wrapper to occupy the full available width.

props.name: sx
props.description: Inline styles (with CSS var support).

props.name: preset
props.description: One or many style-preset names registered via `definePreset()`

bestPractices: Use Slider for ranges where relative position matters; prefer `TextField` for precise numeric entry.
Snap deliberately. Provide step increments that match the domain; avoid overly fine steps that make keyboard or touch fiddly.
Label min/max or current value. Show ticks or helper text for context; keep labels short and avoid clutter.
Keyboard support. Ensure Left/Right (or Up/Down) adjust values by one step, and Page/Home/End jump predictably.
Size for touch. Pick token sizes or numeric height to keep the thumb easy to grab on mobile.
Use presets/tokens for colour and shape. Keep theme‑aligned styling rather than per‑instance CSS.
